name: Personal Space (Michelle Rakar)
description:
I created this game back in 2012 when I was a freshman in college.  The prompt for my Design class' final exam was to create a project that describes our personal space.

Well,  since I'm interested in Game Design, I decided to create a game that depicted what the inside of my mind might look like.

It's a very abstract game that's told in second person. The goal is to explore, but the meaning is up for interpretation.

I realized that I never uploaded this game here, even though it was a completed game that I made the assets for.
